participant_abstract.sent: The industrial designer gave a presentation about the electronics means for the remote (energy source, signal type, etc...).
Then the user interface designer gave a presentation on the different options for the remote's looks: engineering design or simple.
We are going for the simple option.
Finally Reissa gave a presentation on the marketing aspect of things.
We discussed voice recognition, button types (RIS)...
Here again we are going for the cheap and simple option.
We will just take into account the RIS problem and see what we can do for easy to press buttons.
We also discussed how the product should look to show that it's a RR product (colors, logo, etc...).

participant_decisions.sent: Engineering design or very simple and basic remote design(1st).

participant_problems.sent: Conflict between going for fancy remote and wanting to make a cheap remote.
Example: Voice recognition would be fancy indeed but the technology for it would cost too much.
